section.p: ‘Your talk of peace insults me!’ rages the bare-chested stranger. His fist lashes out, giving you such a strong buffet in the face that your knees buckle and blackness drops over you like a great wave. By the time your crew can bring you round, the stranger has sailed off in his boat.

Lose 1 Stamina point permanently
(that is, reduce your unwounded Stamina score by 1) and then .
